title: Collections
description: Collections are groups of items or elements. Collections consist of wrappers around one or many items and/or elemetns.

sections.title: Boxes
description: Boxes are made up of a box header and a box body. The browncoat documentation is built using boxes for each documentation segment.

sections.title: Button Groups
description: Button groups consist of a wrapper with a group of any type of button that extends from the `%btn` placeholder.

sections.title: Dropdowns
description: Dropdowns consist of a wrapper with any type of button that extends from the `%btn` placeholder, an unordered list, and an arrow.

sections.title: Listgroups
description: Listgroups are augmented groups of lists or links. Listgroups should not contain links that extend `%btn`. For that use `03_collections/_btngroups.scss`.
